meanings.sent1: The suitcase was chockfull of clothes for the trip.
meanings.sent2: The jar was chockfull of colorful candies.
meanings.sent3: The picnic basket was chockfull of surprises for the family.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt chockfull of happiness on her wedding day.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was chockfull of sparkling jewels.

meanings.definition: Containing a large amount; packed full.
meanings.sent1: The library shelves were chockfull of books waiting to be read.
meanings.sent2: The fridge was chockfull of delicious food for the party.
meanings.sent3: The toy box was chockfull of fun for the children to enjoy.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was chockfull of creative ideas for the project.
meanings.sent5: The market was chockfull of fresh fruits and vegetables.
